title: Discord
description: I came to Discord around 2017. I really like to be best in everything I am there and in Discord I develop the first, best, open-source, persian economy discord-bot, soo it is very enjoyable for me that I am some of the best persian Discord developer.

title: Table Tennis
description: Table tennis, or ping pong, played from class 9 onward, is a dynamic indoor sport where players hit a lightweight ball across a table divided by a net. It cultivates agility, coordination, and strategy. From this age, students acquire hand-eye skills for serves, spins, and tactics. The game fosters strategic thinking, sportsmanship, and camaraderie. It's a physically active outlet, promoting well-being in a sedentary era. Starting early also builds lasting social connections.

title: Instagram
description: I came to Instagram around 2014 and I always wanted to work in social media, and the same thing happened on Instagram and I started producing content in this community.

title: Space
description: I love learning about space and the universe, and everything connected to it, like quantum physics, which proves a variety of dizzying theories, such as parallel universes, Continuity, singularity, time travel, black holes, and white holes.
